## OPage interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface OPage<Route extends OPageRoute = OPageRoute> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [name](./oweb.opage.name.md) | string | The page name getter. |
|  [routes](./oweb.opage.routes.md) | Route\[\] | The page routes getter. |

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [install(pager)?](./oweb.opage.install.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Called once when registering the page. |
|  [onClose(oldRoute, newRoute)?](./oweb.opage.onclose.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Called before page close. |

|  [requireLogin(context, route)?](./oweb.opage.requirelogin.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Does this page require a verified user for the requested page route. |
